text:
@SecPompeo Declaration of cold war 2.0? NO! It is already at war time!
#CCPChina and #Chinazi declared it in Jan 2020, starting with #CCPvirus / #COVID19 #pandemic worldwide! They use death of #GeorgeFloydMurder as excuse to overthrow #USA regime and system, & turn #USprotests into #USriot!
